overview: Morsi resorts to a colleague who studies his business, Medhat, to work for him. Medhat offers to participate in drug trafficking. Mahrous, head of the gang, tells Mursi that he is charged with murder and possessing drugs and is sentenced to life imprisonment. Morsi escapes from prison and learns about six Hassan. Mahrous kills Medhat and happens to reach Morsi before he utters his breath, confesses to him the crime of Mahrous, which he arranged for him to resist revenge. The police officers arrest Mahrous after six of them inform him. Morsi speeds up to escape and reaches the sea and does not respond to those who call him to tell him his innocence.
title: The Killer Of Karmoz
